DynamoRIO
Obtaining Help and Reporting Bugs

When using a complex system like DynamoRIO, problems can be challenging to diagnose. This section contains some debugging tips and shows how to get help.

Extensive tips for Debugging are separated onto their own page. Similarly, DynamoRIO's Logging is described here.

When using the DrCacheSim tool's offline traces, see DrCacheSim Offline Trace Debugging.

Discussion Forum

For questions and discussion, join the DynamoRIO Users group.

If you are sure a problem you hit is a bug in DynamoRIO, see the instructions for Reporting Problems.

DR_ASSERT
#define DR_ASSERT(x)
